CustomField.description: Users populate this optional text field that provides a description of the alternate text to print under a signature line for this signer. This is used if something other than the signer's name should print under the signature line.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the description of the alternate text to print under a signature line for this user, which is used when something other than the signer's name.
CustomField.label: Alternate Signature Description
